body.p:
Stanford July 28" 1865
Governor T, E, Bramlette

I present to your acquaintance the bearer of this note W C Stoughton of Michigan, from information by Letters from distinguished Gentlemen of Detroit, I have no hesitancey in saying he is very worthy of your confidence; and hope you will show him all the Kindness in your power
